content: * k 4 k2tog *repeat until the end of round 80 sts remain  switch to size 7 24 circs  work st st for 2 crown  divide sts evenly onto four size 7 dpns  decrease round * k to center 4 sts ssk k2tog k to end of dpn *repeat for each dpn  k 1 round  continue to alternate the decrease round with 1 round of st st until 8 sts remain 2 sts per needle © 2016 kent turman all rights reserved page|4 go-to watch cap by kent turman finishing  break yarn leaving a 6 tail  using tapestry needle thread the tail through the remaining 8 sts and close crown  push the tail down through the closed crown center and weave on the ws  fill a sink with lukewarm water and wool wash  immerse the hat in the water for 10-15 minutes  gently remove from the sink and squeeze out any extra water or moisture  lay flat as shown and allow to air dry © 2016 kent turman all rights reserved page|5
